sense.def:
A tally
je neuradno zapisovanje količin, ki jih postopoma dodajamo.

seg.quote: Can you keep a tally of your own marks, please?

sense.def:
Kadar številki ali trditvi
tally
, sta enaki.

seg.quote: We've checked their stories and they don't quite tally.
The amount she mentioned failed to tally with the figure shown in the records.
